head.description: Searches for recent and upcoming public events hosted by Meetup groups. Its search window is the past one month through the next three months, and is subject to change. Open Events is optimized to search for current events by location, topic, or text. If you're looking for a particular event or events within a particular group, use the standard [Events](/meetup_api/docs/2/events/) method.
head.title: Meetup Open Events v2

item.description:
This is an interactive Meetup event.

1PM - 7PM

Meet our Sports Medicine Doctor

Come and go at your leisure. Bring a friend!!

We will be giving complimentary Chair Massages and Body Fat Analyses.

Bring your business card and enter for a chance to win an 1-hour massage!

Don't forget to "LIKE" us on Facebook

item.description:
Hi everyone!

Functional style boot camp requires no machines. It's your body weight, some resistance bands, and motivation that will get you through this workout. Come check it out!

Address:

New York, NY 10017

Become a member of 360Fit on Facebook for fitness tips and special promotions!

See you at the studio!


Shanna: shanna@360fit.biz
Learn more about 360Fit at www.360fit.biz
item.name: Indoor Boot Camp- Tuesday 6pm

item.description: Are you looking to be a fit mom? This is the class for you! This total body routine will help you maintain your health throughout your pregnancy. Moms-to-be of all fitness levels and through all stages of pregnancy are welcome. I work with a physical therapist who is on site to help with any pregnancy related discomfort you may be feeling. All participants will need to provide a doctor's clearance before beginning. Please bring a towel and water bottle with you. Wearing a heart rate monitor is strongly suggested.
item.name: Pre-Baby Prehab

item.description:
Hi everyone!

Intense Core/Cardio Class is a mixture of 3 minutes of cardio, then 3 minutes of core work. This is a fast-paced class so be prepared when you come in. Open to all fitness levels to do your best!

360Fit Studio is located near Grand Central Station. Class starts at 7:00pm so please allow yourself enough time to get there. Follow us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.c...

New address:
211 East 43rd Street, Suite 1105
New York, NY 10017

* You must RSVP for class.

Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions.

See you at the studio!


Shanna
Learn more about 360Fit at www.360fit.biz
item.name: Intense Core/Cardio Class:Tuesday 7pm

item.description:
Is it possible to have too much Origami? In the world of OMG never!

There has been some interest in another weekly meeting for Tuesday so I thought I'd try it out to see what happens. And so begins our very first WTF! (Weekly Tuesday Folding)

This meeting will be more project oriented. Each meeting will have a specific model or models we will all learn together either through a diagram or book or from a teacher. I would like to gear this meeting to a more advanced folding level. But everyone is still welcome to come and fold and hang out and learn and improve their folding skills.


For the first few meetings, we will meet at the downtown Cosi on 8th st between University and Broadway. it's a great meeting spot and a perfect place to fold, we might change the location in the coming weeks so we can have a variety of meeting spaces.

I set the time at 6pm so early birds can get a head start, I am usually there then to try and reserve seating. If I am not there by then grab a table for us and we will join you shortly after. we will probably start the group folding at 7pm so make sure to make it by then. The Cosi closes at 10pm so we will fold until then and maybe head over to the starbucks in astor place which closes at 1am for the late night folks. Lets see how things go from there.

if you have models you would like to learn or teach, let me know and we will try our best to accommodate.

hope to see you there! happy folding!!

-Sok

NOTE: reminders emails for WTF will not be sent out after this first notice because it will always be at the same time and same place and same day of the week and I am trying my best not to send out too many mass emails for the group! So check back here on the website for any changes and updates or cancellations ;)
item.name: WTF (Weekley Tuesday Folders)

item.description: Are you looking to be a fit mom? This is the class for you! This total body routine will help you maintain your health throughout your pregnancy. Moms-to-be of all fitness levels and through all stages of pregnancy are welcome. I work with a physical therapist who is on site to help with any pregnancy related discomfort you may be feeling. item.name: Pre-Baby Prehab

item.description:
Join other breastfeeding moms in a casual and relaxed setting to ask your most pressing breastfeeding questions like:


* How do I know if my baby is getting enough?
* Is my latch correct?
* Why does it hurt my left breast and not my right?
* Will my nipples ever feel the same again?

This 1-1/2 hour weekly support group is run by International Board Certified Lactation Consultant (IBCLC) and Registered Lactation Consultant (RLC) Melissa Kotlen Nagin. Melissa teaches prenatal breastfeeding classes at the 92nd Street Y and maintains an active private practice in New York City. About her job as an IBCLC, Melissa says "Helping mothers in all matters breastfeeding has been the most fulfilling job I've ever had (other than being a mother of three beautiful children, of course)." My professional goal has always been to provide support, solutions and confidence to women as they endeavor to provide this great, natural gift to their children.”

Drop-in. Babies welcome.
item.name: Weekly Breastfeeding Support Group

item.description:
Come dance the pounds off this Thursday at 6pm with Ashley Simone. She uses easy to follow hip hop dance moves to get you sweating and burning calories through the hour. Sign up now! Stay for an additional class the same night for just $10.

Check us out at www.360fit.biz

 

-Shanna

item.name: Adventure Boot Camp Downtown Sacramento Meetup

item.description:
Initially, our meetings will be meeting new people who have similar ideals. Meeting in a restaurant will meet that there will be food available and let's face it we could all use a night out without cooking or more importantly having to clean up after. There will be a form of "show & Tell" bring something that helps you keep a good body image. I personally will introduce a new book called "My Mom is Fat".

I think it will be a very fun time and very little judgment about anything. Hope to see you there please rsvp so I can have a correct count to tell the restaurant.
item.name: mom's with positive body images Monthly Meetup

item.description:
The first meeting will be a brief introduction to the theory behind cognitively correct system of communication.

You will also get to meet "the preschoolers' GooRoo" and ask your individualized questions about how to help your child and you communicate better.

You will meet other people who also are interested in this topic with preschool age children.

You will have an opportunity to purchase the only manual on preschoolers and their stage of development at a reduced price.

Mainly, you will learn valuable information to help your personal parenting style to fit how your preschoolers' brain processes information.
item.name: Speaking with preschoolers, removing the "no's" Monthly Meetup

item.name: Storytime

item.description:
What is a weekly brown bag lunch? An opportunity to gather in a casual setting with other women for lunch (please bring your own) and friendly conversation with or without baby. The weekly lunches will be led by Sara Newman, Doula (DONA Certified) and Lactation Counselor and the mother of Hallie and Zachary. Sara is fantastic at answering all infant care related questions and encouraging expectant and new moms to make decisions that are right for them and their baby.

Please note that there is no cost to attend this event, however a $5 donation to offset administrative costs is appreciated.
item.name: Weekly Brown Bag Lunch at Yummy Mummy - Every Thursday

item.description:
Hello Teachers!

Next week we will come together at Nikki Beach. Last time we had about six of you that came through the night. It was a gorgeous day, and people were having a good time mingling. For this gathering I will also be inviting our Bankers and Nurses groups. I am due to start a couple more, but those will be a surprise.

As always you will have drink and food specials. We had a great time mingling and head-bopping the last time (I'm hoping for a little more dancing this time around).

Bring friends, it's a nice scene!

Best,

Damien
914-621-6522
Damien@nycexp.com

Meetups will happen every Saturday morning at 8 am starting March 6. There is no cost for the Meet Up at this time. Come! Meet others who are interested in toning up their arms, getting a flat belly, and having more energy while getting the workout of your life!

The Regular Class Schedule at New Body Boot Camp & Wellness is as follows.

Monday 6:30am , 9:30am, 6:30pm
Tues 6:30 pm
Wed 6:30am, 9:30am, 6:30pm
Thurs 6:30pm
Fri 6:30am, 9:30am
Sat 8am (Meetup group)

I apologize for any confusion about the class schedule earlier.

item.name: Family Yoga Meetup

item.description:
Let's go circle crazy! I know many of you have the circle cutting system from CM. So, lets put them to use.

We will create a page layout using photos of friends, family or a special event. You will be surprised how many photos you can put on a page when you crop your photos with your circle cutters. Plus, when done right it can be fun, fun, fun.

Also, we will create a page layout that uses the circle cutters to create great embellishments that will change drab pages to wow!

If you don't have the circle cutting system, don't worry. You can try it out at our workshop

Workshop is $12 by paypal. $10 by check.

Please, bring adhesives, trimmers, circle cutters, blades,cutting mat, your favorite paper, pens and over 20 pictures to use for your page layouts.

Also, bring other projects to work on after class for we will crop into the night as always.

If you are working on digital after the class, don't forget your laptop cords and flash drives.

Snack will be available. However, no food will be served. You are more than welcomed to bring food or order in. Anyone, who brings snack to share with the group will receive 2 extra raffle tickets for our 50th meetup prize giveaway.

Send check payments to : Jean'ette Carrigo
860 E. Broadway #5C
Long Beach, NY 11561

Must RSVP for this workshop.  Space is limited so I can give individual help.

Sorry, no refunds


Contact me if you have any questions
